Projects

A structured view of AI/ML pipelines, quantitative models, data engineering work on AWS, GovCon analytics dashboards, and D3 visualizations.

AI & ML Pipelines

  • Text prediction application with machine learning

    Built an end-to-end text prediction application using natural language processing and machine learning, deployed as an interactive Shiny app.

  • End-to-end AI pipeline for operational insights

    Designed an end-to-end ML pipeline from ingestion through deployment and monitoring to surface high-signal operational insights.

Quant & Financial Models

  • Quant model for risk-aware forecasting

    Built a quantitative forecasting model that focuses on risk and scenario analysis rather than point estimates.

Data Engineering & AWS Pipelines

  • AWS data pipeline for analytics at scale

    Implemented a reliable AWS-based data pipeline to power analytics and dashboards with strong observability.

GovCon Analytics Dashboards

  • Futbol League Explorer application

    Interactive Shiny application for exploring and analyzing futbol league data with filtering, visualization, and statistical insights.

  • GovCon analytics dashboard for mission KPIs

    Delivered a mission-focused analytics dashboard that aligned stakeholders on KPIs, trends, and actionable levers.

D3.js Visualizations

  • D3.js visualizations portfolio

    Interactive D3.js visualizations exploring demographics, population patterns, and sports analytics for exploratory data analysis.
